WITH ORDER_INFO AS( SELECT A.order_date AS order_date, A.order_num AS order_num, A.oid_fk AS oid_fk, B.pname AS pName, COUNT(B.pname)-1 AS order_count, SUBSTR(A.order_date,1,4) AS YY, SUBSTR(A.order_date,6,2) AS MM, SUBSTR(A.order_date,9,2) AS DD, SUBSTR(A.order_date,12,2) AS HH, SUBSTR(A.order_date,15,2) AS minutes, SUM(A.qty_ordered*A.price_each) AS TOT_PURCHASE_AMOUNT FROM tbl_order A LEFT JOIN tbl_product B ON A.pnum_fk = B.pnum WHERE oid_fk = #{id} GROUP BY YY, MM, DD, HH, minutes )
SELECT order_date, order_num, pName, order_count, oid_fk, TOT_PURCHASE_AMOUNT FROM ORDER_INFO ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_date FROM tbl_order WHERE order_num = #{order_num}
SELECT * FROM tbl_order A left join tbl_product B on A.pnum_fk = B.pnum left join tbl_category C on B.pcategory_fk = C.cat_code WHERE order_date = #{order_date}
